tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geofencing_alerts (
    alert_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT NOT NULL,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    geographic_area VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_locations (
   vehicle_id INT,
   location_name TEXT,
   latitude DECIMAL,
   longitude DECIMAL,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_locations (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name TEXT,
    latitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
    longitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE geo_fence_areas (
    area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name TEXT,
    min_latitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
    max_latitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
    min_longitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
    max_longitude DOUBLE PRECISION
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_tracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    area_id INT,
    is_inside BOOLEAN,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicle_locations(vehicle_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES geo_fence_areas(area_id)
);

CREATE TABLE alert_history (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    alert_type TEXT,
    alert_message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicle_locations(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE geographic_area (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   name VARCHAR(255),
   area_description TEXT,
   area_type VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE geofence_alert (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   vehicle_id INT,
   area_id INT,
   alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_time TIMESTAMP,
   FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicle(id),
   FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES geographic_area(id));

CREATE TABLE entry_event (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   geofence_alert_id INT,
   entry_time TIMESTAMP,
   FOREIGN KEY (geofence_alert_id) REFERENCES geofence_alert(id));

CREATE TABLE exit_event (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   geofence_alert_id INT,
   exit_time TIMESTAMP,
   FOREIGN KEY (geofence_alert_id) REFERENCES geofence_alert(id));
